title: PHP JavaScript Unquoted Assignment
description: Reflects the q parameter from PHP into an unquoted JavaScript assignment.
php:
PHP to JavaScript Unquoted Assignment

The q parameter is injected directly into an unquoted JavaScript variable.

Param: ?q=

End the assignment with a semicolon and add your own JavaScript to trigger code execution.
objectives: Break out of the unquoted assignment with a semicolon.
Inject JavaScript such as alert(1) and observe its execution.
Ensure the page remains syntactically valid after your payload.
hints: The context is: var data = [INPUT]; built via PHP.
End the line, then add your payload.
